TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 1, pp. 96

barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 1, pp. 96

div1.p: Marietta June 8th 1805 For value received I promise to pay Benjamin Ives Gilman or order the sum of one hundred and sixty-seven Dollars and Thirty-two cents, payable in Lead at five Dollars p hundred, to be delivered at St. Genevieve in six months from this Date—
for M[oses Austin?] G. W. Treat
